channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
I have a moparscape server sorce is testscape but even that im owner its says theres other people are mods/admin i just made it and im level 3 but how i make my self a admin and why it say other peoples names please help me how i code my stuff and all tht like npc's admin commands please POST!! :eek: i dont get it dont just say like oo umm i think can you really help its really making me like wtf?? i really wnana know coz i want my own server that i can banned people and that like im in control please help with coding and stuff above..? :confused: :confused:
like how i make it so i make up my own commands like ::kick[user] or admin command master for all 99 its like im just a player???

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

If you didn’t understand the tutorial.

Then I now pronounce you:

Officially:

Retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @nuffenburger nuffenburger
item.description:
@nuffenburger wrote:

you have to edit your character file in order to make yourself owner and set your rights to 3
then you have to go into the npcdialogue.java if you have that file and edit what the npc says.
if you dont have that file then look around for the words they are saying. ctrl f is your friend

Read full topic

omg can some one please help i mad it off a tutoral not just say read this…

plz!!!@!@!!@!@
